author: stefanbratanov
content: Hi, I wrote a client CLI implementation of the spec in Java https://github.com/StefanBratanov/chotto I tested it against https://kzg-ceremony-sequencer-dev.fly.dev and it seems to work well. I would be very happy if people here can have a look, try it out and give a review/feedback of the UX/implementation. I am using the java wrapper of the blst library for the crypto stuff. Also ECDSA signatures are not implemented at that point.
